item.title: China's New Real Estate Boom? Using satellite data to quantify over-expansion in fixed assets
item.description: China’s New Real Estate Boom? Using satellite data to quantify over-expansion in fixed assets # Contents # Satellite Data: Night Time Lights (NTL) Verifying the Data Set: Tesla, Rare Earths, Eastern China China Fixed Asset Growth by Province Takeaways Exec Summary # We use an innovative alternative data set – satellite Night Time Lights (NTL) – to quantify China’s expansion in fixed assets (real estate, factories, infrastructure).

item.title: The End of a Chapter - The bumpy road of transition ahead
item.description: The End of a Chapter: The bumpy road of transition ahead # Contents # Faltering Real Estate Prices The Three Eras of China’s Economic Development Down Memory Lane: US 2007 & Japan 1991 Exec Summary # In recent years, Chinese gross investment has continued to look quite strong, but more and more of it has merely been to replace wearing-out or obsolescing fixed capital, and net investment — the [aggregate] profit source — has been on a long and gradual and steepening decline [from ~2010].
